      Source code for pycheron.util.getTrace

      from __future__ import division, absolute_import, print_function

__all__ = ['getTrace']



      [docs]def getTrace(st, numTrace):
    """
    Obtain a specific trace in a stream matching the index of the trace provided

    :param st: Obspy stream object
    :type st: obspy.core.stream.Stream
    :param numTrace: Index of desired trace data in the stream object
    :type numTrace: int

    :return: obspy trace object of the specified trace
    :rtype: obspy.core.trace.Trace
    """
    tr = st[numTrace]
    return tr
